name: Lilliam Pumpernickel 3
description:
Lilliam Pumpernickel is back in an all new adventure. Explore an entirely new world and fight new enemies! Lilliam has never felt this alive before! Nearly 30 levels and 3 different worlds!

Dev's Note:* Hey, S34_M0NST3R here. Despite the date on this one, I actually made this game a couple years ago. Development started right after the second game was finished , and before Archangel was made. I never ended up uploading this one as it was never finished (version 1.6.0 is honestly just a demo), but I'm uploading it now for continuity's sake and such. Welp, enjoy!
